verses.verse: <WH7637>"'In the seventh month,<WH2320> on the first<WH259> day of the month,<WH2320> you shall have a holy<WH6944> convocation;<WH4744> you shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work:<WH4399> it is a day<WH3117> of blowing of trumpets to you.<WH8643>

You shall offer<WH6213> a burnt offering<WH5930> for a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to Yahweh:<WH3068> one<WH259> young<WH1241> bull,<WH6499> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> seven<WH7651> male lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish;<WH8549>
and their meal offering,<WH4503> fine flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil,<WH8081> three<WH7969> tenth parts<WH6241> for the bull,<WH6499> two<WH8147> tenth parts<WH6241> for the ram,<WH352>
and one<WH259> tenth part<WH6241> for every<WH259> lamb<WH3532> of the seven<WH7651> lambs;<WH3532>
and one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH8163> for a sin offering,<WH2403> to make atonement for you;<WH3722>

besides the burnt offering<WH5930> of the new moon,<WH2320> and the meal offering<WH4503> of it,<WH8548> and the continual burnt offering<WH5930> and the meal offering<WH4503> of it,<WH5262> and their drink offerings, according to their ordinance,<WH4941> for a pleasant<WH5207> aroma,<WH7381> an offering made by fire<WH801> to Yahweh.<WH3068>

<WH6218>"'On the tenth day of this seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320> you shall have a holy<WH6944> convocation;<WH4744> and you shall afflict<WH6031> your souls:<WH5315> you shall do<WH6213> no kind of work;<WH4399>

but you shall offer<WH7126> a burnt offering<WH5930> to Yahweh<WH3068> for a pleasant<WH5207> aroma:<WH7381> one<WH259> young<WH1241> bull,<WH6499> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> seven<WH7651> male lambs<WH3532> a<WH8141> year<WH8141> old;<WH8549> they shall be to you without blemish;

and their meal offering,<WH4503> fine flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil,<WH8081> three<WH7969> tenth parts<WH6241> for the bull,<WH6499> two<WH8147> tenth parts<WH6241> for the one<WH259> ram,<WH352>
a tenth part<WH6241> for every<WH259> lamb<WH3532> of the seven<WH7651> lambs:<WH3532>

one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH8163> for a sin offering;<WH2403> besides the sin offering<WH2403> of atonement,<WH3725> and the continual<WH8548> burnt offering,<WH2403> and the meal offering<WH5930> of it,<WH4503> and their drink offerings.

<WH2568>"'On the fifteenth day<WH3117> of the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320> you shall have a holy<WH6944> convocation;<WH4744> you shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work,<WH4399> and you shall keep<WH2287> a feast<WH2282> to Yahweh<WH3068> seven<WH7651> days:<WH3117>

and you shall offer<WH7126> a burnt offering,<WH5930> an offering made by fire,<WH801> of a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to Yahweh;<WH3068> thirteen<WH7969> young<WH1241> bulls,<WH6499> two<WH8147> rams,<WH352> fourteen<WH702> male lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old;<WH8549> they shall be without blemish;

and their meal offering,<WH4503> fine flour<WH5560> mixed<WH1101> with oil,<WH8081> three<WH7969> tenth parts<WH6241> for every<WH259> bull<WH6499> of the thirteen<WH7969> bulls,<WH6499> two<WH8147> tenth parts<WH6241> for each<WH259> ram<WH352> of the two<WH8147> rams,<WH352>
and a tenth part<WH6241> for every<WH259> lamb<WH3532> of the fourteen<WH702> lambs;<WH3532>
and one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin offering,<WH2403> besides the continual<WH8548> burnt offering,<WH2403> the meal offering<WH2403> of it,<WH5262> and the drink offering of it.

<WH8145>"'On the second day<WH3117> you shall offer twelve<WH8147> young<WH1121> bulls,<WH6499> two<WH8147> rams,<WH352> fourteen<WH702> male lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish;<WH8549>

and their meal offering<WH4503> and their drink offerings<WH5262> for the bulls,<WH6499> for the rams,<WH352> and for the lambs,<WH3532> according to their number,<WH4557> after the ordinance;<WH4941>
and one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin offering;<WH2403> besides the continual<WH8548> burnt offering,<WH2403> and the meal offering<WH5930> of it,<WH4503> and their drink offerings.
<WH7992>"'On the third day<WH3117> eleven<WH6249> bulls,<WH6499> two<WH8147> rams,<WH352> fourteen<WH702> male lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish;<WH8549>

and their meal offering<WH4503> and their drink offerings<WH5262> for the bulls,<WH6499> for the rams,<WH352> and for the lambs,<WH3532> according to their number,<WH4557> after the ordinance;<WH4941>
and one<WH259> male goat<WH8163> for a sin offering;<WH2403> besides the continual<WH8548> burnt offering,<WH2403> and the meal offering<WH5930> of it,<WH5262> and the drink offering of it.
<WH7243>"'On the fourth day<WH3117> ten<WH6235> bulls,<WH6499> two<WH8147> rams,<WH352> fourteen<WH702> male lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish;<WH8549>
their meal offering<WH4503> and their drink offerings<WH5262> for the bulls,<WH6499> for the rams,<WH352> and for the lambs,<WH3532> according to their number,<WH4557> after the ordinance;<WH4941>
and one<WH259> male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin offering;<WH2403> besides the continual<WH8548> burnt offering,<WH2403> the meal offering<WH2403> of it,<WH5262> and the drink offering of it.
<WH2549>"'On the fifth day<WH3117> nine<WH8672> bulls,<WH6499> two<WH8147> rams,<WH352> fourteen<WH702> male lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish;<WH8549>

and their meal offering<WH4503> and their drink offerings<WH5262> for the bulls,<WH6499> for the rams,<WH352> and for the lambs,<WH3532> according to their number,<WH4557> after the ordinance;<WH4941>
and one<WH259> male goat<WH8163> for a sin offering,<WH2403> besides the continual<WH8548> burnt offering,<WH5930> and the meal offering<WH4503> of it,<WH5262> and the drink offering of it.
<WH8345>"'On the sixth day<WH3117> eight<WH8083> bulls,<WH6499> two<WH8147> rams,<WH352> fourteen<WH702> male lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish;<WH8549>

and their meal offering<WH4503> and their drink offerings<WH5262> for the bulls,<WH6499> for the rams,<WH352> and for the lambs,<WH3532> according to their number,<WH4557> after the ordinance;<WH4941>
and one<WH259> male goat<WH8163> for a sin offering;<WH2403> besides the continual<WH8548> burnt offering,<WH5930> the meal offering<WH4503> of it,<WH5262> and the drink offerings of it.
<WH7637>"'On the seventh day<WH3117> seven<WH7651> bulls,<WH6499> two<WH8147> rams,<WH352> fourteen<WH702> male lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish;<WH8549>

and their meal offering<WH4503> and their drink offerings<WH5262> for the bulls,<WH6499> for the rams,<WH352> and for the lambs,<WH3532> according to their number,<WH4557> after the ordinance;<WH4941>
and one<WH259> male goat<WH8163> for a sin offering;<WH2403> besides the continual<WH8548> burnt offering,<WH5930> the meal offering<WH4503> of it,<WH5262> and the drink offering of it.
<WH8066>"'On the eighth day<WH3117> you shall have a solemn assembly:<WH6116> you shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work;<WH4399>

but you shall offer<WH7126> a burnt offering,<WH5930> an offering made by fire,<WH801> of a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to Yahweh:<WH3068> one<WH259> bull,<WH6499> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> seven<WH7651> male lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old without blemish;<WH8549>

their meal offering<WH4503> and their drink offerings<WH5262> for the bull,<WH6499> for the ram,<WH352> and for the lambs,<WH3532> shall be according to their number,<WH4557> after the ordinance:<WH4941>
and one<WH259> male goat<WH8163> for a sin offering,<WH2403> besides the continual<WH8548> burnt offering,<WH2403> and the meal offering<WH5930> of it,<WH5262> and the drink offering of it.

<WH6213>"'You shall offer these to Yahweh<WH3068> in your set feasts,<WH4150> besides your vows,<WH5088> and your freewill offerings,<WH5071> for your burnt offerings,<WH5930> and for your meal offerings,<WH4503> and for your drink offerings,<WH5262> and for your peace offerings.<WH8002>'"
Moses<WH4872> told<WH559> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> according to all that Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
